SEARCH

Uses of Package
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth

Packages that use org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth
Package
Description
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth
Authentication and authorization framework for Gumdrop servers.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.ftp.file
Filesystem-based FTP handler implementations.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.http
HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2 server implementation.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.imap
IMAP4rev2 server implementation for Gumdrop.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.pop3
POP3 (Post Office Protocol version 3) server implementation.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.quota
Storage quota management for Gumdrop services.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet
Servlet 4.0 container implementation.
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.smtp
SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) server implementation.
  • Classes in org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth used by org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth
    Class
    Description
    Realm
    A realm is a collection of authenticatable principals.
    Realm.ScramCredentials
    SCRAM credentials for a user (RFC 5802).
    Realm.TokenValidationResult
    Result of token validation containing principal and scope information.
    SASLMechanism
    Enumeration of supported SASL authentication mechanisms.
